ayas.translation: In the name of Allah, most benevolent, ever-merciful.
WOE TO THOSE who give short measure,

ayas.arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ إِذَا ٱكْتَالُوا۟ عَلَى ٱلنَّاسِ يَسْتَوْفُونَ
ayas.translation: Who insist on being given full when they take from others,
Whilst when they measure or weigh for them, give less.
ayas.transliteration: wa idhā kālūhum aw wazanūhum yukhsirūn

ayas.translation: Do they not think they will be raised (to life) again
On a grievous day,
The day all mankind will stand before the Lord of all the worlds?

ayas.arabic: كَلَّآ إِنَّ كِتَـٰبَ ٱلْفُجَّارِ لَفِى سِجِّينٍ
ayas.translation: Indeed the ledger of the wicked will be in (the lowest depths) Sijjin.
ayas.transliteration: kallā inna kitābal fujjāri lafī sijjīn

ayas.translation: How will you comprehend what Sijjin is?
It is a (repository of) distinctly written record.
Ah the woe that day for those who deny,
Who call the Day of judgement a lie!

ayas.arabic: وَمَا يُكَذِّبُ بِهِۦٓ إِلَّا كُلُّ مُعْتَدٍ أَثِيمٍ
ayas.translation: None denies it but the sinful transgressors.
ayas.transliteration: wa mā yukadhhibu bihi illā kullu mu`tadin athīm

ayas.arabic: إِذَا تُتْلَىٰ عَلَيْهِ ءَايَـٰتُنَا قَالَ أَسَـٰطِيرُ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ
ayas.translation: When Our revelations are recited before him, he says: "These are fables of long ago."

ayas.arabic: كَلَّا ۖ بَلْ ۜ رَانَ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِهِم مَّا كَانُوا۟ يَكْسِبُونَ
ayas.translation: No. In fact what they have been doing has rusted their hearts.
ayas.transliteration: kallā ۖ bal ۜ rāna `alā qulūbihim mā kānū yaksibūn

ayas.arabic: كَلَّآ إِنَّهُمْ عَن رَّبِّهِمْ يَوْمَئِذٍ لَّمَحْجُوبُونَ
ayas.translation: Therefore they will be screened off from their Lord that day,
Then they will indeed burn in Hell.

ayas.arabic: ثُمَّ يُقَالُ هَـٰذَا ٱلَّذِى كُنتُم بِهِۦ تُكَذِّبُونَ
ayas.translation: They will then be told: "This is what you had denied."
ayas.transliteration: thumma yuqālu hādhal ladhī kuntum bihi tukadhhibūn

ayas.arabic: كَلَّآ إِنَّ كِتَـٰبَ ٱلْأَبْرَارِ لَفِى عِلِّيِّينَ
ayas.translation: Surely the ledger of the pious will be in 'Illiyun (heights above the heights).
But how will you comprehend what 'Illiyun is?
It is a (repository of) distinctly written record
Witnessed by those who are honoured.
Verily the pious will be in heaven,
On couches face to face.
On their faces you will see the glow of beatitude.
They will be served the choicest wine, sealed

ayas.arabic: خِتَـٰمُهُۥ مِسْكٌ ۚ وَفِى ذَٰلِكَ فَلْيَتَنَافَسِ ٱلْمُتَنَـٰفِسُونَ
ayas.translation: With a sealing of musk, which those who aspire for the best should desire, --
ayas.transliteration: khitāmuhu misk ۚ wafī dhālika falyatanāfasil mutanāfisūn

ayas.translation: Blended with the water of Tasnim, (heights ultimate of evolution),
A fountain from which only they who are honoured drink.

ayas.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ أَجْرَمُوا۟ كَانُوا۟ مِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ يَضْحَكُونَ
ayas.translation: The sinners indeed laughed at believers
ayas.transliteration: innal ladhīna ajramū kānū minal ladhīna āmanū yaḍ-ḥakūn

ayas.translation: And winked at one another as they passed by them;

ayas.arabic: وَإِذَا ٱنقَلَبُوٓا۟ إِلَىٰٓ أَهْلِهِمُ ٱنقَلَبُوا۟ فَكِهِينَ
ayas.translation: And when they went back to their people turned to make fun of them;

ayas.arabic: وَإِذَا رَأَوْهُمْ قَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ لَضَآلُّونَ
ayas.translation: And when they saw them, they said: "They have indeed gone astray."
ayas.transliteration: wa idhā ra-awhum qālū inna hā-ulā-i laḍāllūn

ayas.translation: But they were not Sent to be guardians over them!

ayas.arabic: فَٱلْيَوْمَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ مِنَ ٱلْكُفَّارِ يَضْحَكُونَ
ayas.translation: So, the believers will laugh at the infidels on that day,
ayas.transliteration: fal yawmal ladhīna āmanū minal kuffāri yaḍ-ḥakūn

ayas.translation: Regarding them from their cushioned seats.

ayas.arabic: هَلْ ثُوِّبَ ٱلْكُفَّارُ مَا كَانُوا۟ يَفْعَلُونَ
ayas.translation: Will not the infidels pay for what they had done?
ayas.transliteration: hal thuwwibal kuffāru mā kānū yaf`alūn
